channel.title: Item Spawn Points
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with item spawn points? I need a code or something that will make rares spawn all over runescape in the free world area for a rare event. I will pay the best I can.
Example:
[code]ItemHandler.addItem(962, 3248, 3440, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 1 day drop! ItemHandler.addItem(962, 3270, 3440, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 1 day drop! ItemHandler.addItem(962, 3261, 3410, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // 1 day drop! item.title: Item Spawn Points
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

kupo:

You have to add it in more then itemspawn or itemdroppoints or w/e you add it in.

its the drops.cfg fileâ€¦

item.title: Item Spawn Points

item.description:
@kupo wrote:

You have to add it in more then itemspawn or itemdroppoints or w/e you add it in.
